rows.label: qst700703_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you Bry-san? Nittle-san
sent us to ask you to start
the garden maintenance...

rows.label: qst700703_msg0002
rows.name:
Sorry, we're effectively
closed. Go home.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes, something did!! And it's
all that foolish son's fault!!

rows.label: qst700703_msg0005
rows.name:
He can't even bring a single grain
of sand! Where is he slacking off?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0006
rows.name: ...Sand? Did your son go to get sand?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0008
rows.name:
I told him to be so careful... I
wonder where and what he is doing.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0009
rows.name: It seems there are some circumstances.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0010
rows.name:
If we can help, we'd be happy
to search. Do you have any idea
where he might have gone?

rows.label: qst700703_msg0011
rows.name:
If I did, I wouldn't be
having this trouble.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0012
rows.name:
...However, there is a forest
deep in Haradd Hills. He may have
gotten lost there by mistake.

rows.label: qst700703_msg0013
rows.name:
If you find him, could you
drag him back here? I can't
get any work done like this!
